name: Mindcaster Demo
description:
Mindcaster captures an alternative and futuristic reality, characterized by its technological advances, in which the world of entertainment is monopolized by a single company, Walter D. Studios, whose main product is based on the creation of different reality shows in which the actors are real people who are unaware of the world around them beyond the dome they are in and are totally ignorant of their situation.

The organization hires a group of experts called Mindcasters, supervisors who evaluate the psychological behaviors of the inhabitants and maintain the established order. In case someone has become an objective, Mindcasters must locate, neutralize, and correct their behavior.

Mindcaster allows the player to take control of one of these agents, and carry out his mission using conversational mechanics and a combat system that access to the enemy's mind through a bullet hell combat system.
